name: Rollbox
description:
Rollbox

Drop boxes and roll your way to victory in this 2D Puzzle Game!

Welcome to Rollbox!
The objective of the game is to get from the start of the map to the goal using crates dropped from the player's crane. This 2D puzzle game was inspired by the classic flash era and is intended for all ages. Rollbox was created over a 3-week period by Ethan Zarov, Jordan Grayson, and Justin Vo. The original mechanic is based off of the prototype Rolling by IvoryX.

Controls:

LMB to drop crates
LMB over crates to delete them
R (Or in-game restart button) to restart the level
H (Or in-game home button) to return to menu

Creator Links:

Ethan Zarov: https://ethanz.itch.io
Jordan Grayson: https://jordangrayson.itch.io
